instructorDetails.label: INSTRUCTOR
instructorDetails.aboutMeContent:
I love writing code and I love teaching others. I always loved coding, I love diving into complex problems and solving and I still think that it's really an amazing feeling to see an app or program you built from scratch.

You might think that I studied programming and that I got a CS degree - but I didn't! I always liked coding and it was a great hobby but I actually went for 'Biomedical Engineering' when it was time to go to university. And I don't regret it! It was a fun time and I enjoyed all the things taught there. But soon after taking my first steps in typical Biomedical Engineering jobs, it was very clear to me that I had to go back to coding. And that's what I did.

header.title: Our Services

We offer high-quality courses that you can access anytime, from anywhere.
